immediate_action.description: Files safe to delete immediately with no risk

verify_then_delete.description: Unused shadcn components from deleted features - verify no future plans

review_carefully.description: Utilities and components that might be needed for future features

already_staged.description: Files already deleted and in git staging area
already_staged.note: These appear in git status as deleted - just need to commit

verification_steps: Run grep search for each file to confirm no imports
Check git status for already deleted files
Run npm run build after deletions to verify no breakage
Check TypeScript compilation for type errors
Review shadcn component dependencies (some depend on others)
Verify no planned features need these components

estimated_impact.risk_level: Low - most are legacy backups or unused shadcn components
estimated_impact.rollback_difficulty: Easy - all tracked in git history

notes: Many files are from deleted features (forms module, projects section, noted module)
Several shadcn UI components were installed but never used
Legacy backup files should have been deleted during original migrations
Git status shows 8 files already deleted but not committed
Some utility files might be useful in future but currently have zero usage
